install.ios_instructions:
To install EduNet on your iOS device:

1. Tap the Share button (square with arrow up)
2. Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'
3. Tap 'Add' to confirm

This will add EduNet to your home screen for easy access!

questions.question: What is EduNet?
questions.answer: EduNet is a platform for Omani students to share homework, solve academic problems together, and exchange useful study resources.

questions.question: Is EduNet free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! EduNet is completely free for all Omani students. You can sign up and start sharing or accessing resources instantly.

questions.question: Can I upload my own study materials?
questions.answer: Absolutely. EduNet allows you to upload your notes, past papers, and other helpful resources to support your fellow students.

questions.question: Is EduNet only for university students?
questions.answer: No. EduNet is built for both school and university students in Oman who want to collaborate and learn together.

questions.question: How do I ask for help with homework?
questions.answer: You can post your questions in posts section, and other students can share their comments and provide guidance.
